title: List of Billboard number-one singles of 1948
text:
This is a list of number-one songs in the <a href="United%20States">United States</a> during the year 1948 according to "<a href="Billboard%20magazine">Billboard magazine</a>". Prior to the creation of the <a href="Billboard%20Hot%20100">"Billboard" Hot 100</a>, "Billboard" published multiple singles charts each week. In 1948, the following three charts were produced:
Shown is a list of songs that topped the Best Sellers in Stores chart.
